sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { connect } from 'react-redux'
import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'
import Logout from './Logout'
import Navbar  from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar';
import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'
import { getUserReviews, getReviews } from '../actions/reviews/reviews'




const NavBar = ({ currentUser, loggedIn, getUserReviews, getReviews, Navbar, Nav }) => {

  return (
    <Navbar bg = "dark" sticky="top" >
      <Nav className="justify-content-end" variant = "pills" >
        <Nav.Item>
          <Nav.Link>
            <NavLink exact activeClassName="active" to="/concerts" >Concerts</NavLink>
          </Nav.Link>
        </Nav.Item>
        <Nav.Item>
          <Nav.Link>
            <NavLink exact activeClassName="active" to={"/reviews"} >Reviews</NavLink>
          </Nav.Link>
        </Nav.Item>
        <Nav.Item>
          <Nav.Link>
            <NavLink exact activeClassName="active" to={`/users/${currentUser.id}/reviews`} >Your Reviews</NavLink>
          </Nav.Link>
        </Nav.Item>
        <Nav.Item>
          <Nav.Link>
            { loggedIn ? <><Logout/></> : null}
          </Nav.Link>
        </Nav.Item>
      </Nav>
    </Navbar>
  )
}


const mapStateToProps = ({ currentUser }) => {
  return {
    currentUser,
    loggedIn: !!currentUser
  }
}

export default connect(mapStateToProps, {getUserReviews, getReviews})(NavBar)
